title: 2DF Freeplay ROMS 2nd Pack
description:
This is the second torrent specifically made for 2DF FreePlay although you can 
use the roms here for any other purpose. This is a fast growing program so look
forward to another package as more games are added. I will not be seeding older
ROM pack torrents.

You can find FreePlay here: http://2dfighter.com/

If you&#039;re new to FreePlay be sure to read and follow the instructions on how
to get started carefully (found on the home page of the website).

It would help a lot if people would seed more this time around. PLEASE SEED.

About FreePlay:
"FreePlay is a meeting ground where you can chat with and challenge other
players from around the world to play in a wide selection of arcade-perfect
emulated games.

Features:
* Instant replays.
* Private messaging.
* Detailed stat tracking (overall wins/losses, character specific wins/losses, 
etc.)
* Automated player rating system.
* Ignore harassing players.
* P2P connection for best performance.

How does it work?

You use the 2DF FreePlay Client to connect to the 2DF FreePlay Server. After 
challenging or accepting a challenge from another player in the game of your 
choice, the game is automatically launched and the players automatically 
connected. No need to worry about mismatching emulator versions or swapping IP 
addresses."

FreePlay is created by damdai. Be sure to stop by the forums and thank him for
his hardwork and effort.

This torrent was uploaded by Jayce and includes every ROM FreePlay currently
supports as of July 5, 2008. This is including the following:
